titles.title: Critical Material Transparency and Reporting in Advanced Clean Energy Act of 2024
Critical Material Transparency and Reporting in Advanced Clean Energy Act of 2024

To direct the Secretary of Energy to establish and carry out a program to support the development, maintenance, implementation, and adoption of digital identification systems for advanced energy technologies for the purpose of increasing critical material supply chain transparency.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
